ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: ... ack... routing through a workstation is pretty demanding. many don t believe this, but it is. also 3D sounds hits performance pretty much. i still wonder
ygData.messageBody:
> My computer is the server. DSL and cable internet are not
> available to me. I
> support a network of 4 other computers. my brother is almost
> ALWAYS on and
> when he sends an IM or loads a webpage, if I'm in EQ I get
> kicked out. :-(

ack... routing through a workstation is pretty demanding.
many don't believe this, but it is.

also 3D sounds hits performance pretty much. i still
wonder why they have those sound processors on a sound
card. i read an article about the new terratec card; the
bottom line is: cool card, but the _OLD_ drivers decrease
the overall system performance.

it looks like many companies share a common problem: new
hardware is developed much faster than they can write the
software for them.


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
